title: Brassketeers
brief_description: With a nod to the tradition of stories like Coppelia where statues come to life after dark, comes this delightful film that combines live action and animation. In this story, it is those famous Melbourne pieces of public art. From Australia’s premier centre for animation and interactive media RMIT AIM.
